clients.name: HeaderParamClient
clients.doc: Client for testing header parameter moved to client level.

methodParameterSegments.name: name
methodParameterSegments.doc: The name of the client. This parameter is used as a header in all operations.

parameters.name: contentType
parameters.doc: Body parameter's content type. Known values are application/json

methodParameterSegments.name: contentType
methodParameterSegments.doc: Body parameter's content type. Known values are application/json

clients.name: MultipleParamsClient
clients.doc: Client for testing multiple parameters (header and query) moved to client level.

methodParameterSegments.name: name
methodParameterSegments.doc: The name of the client. This parameter is used as a header in all operations.

methodParameterSegments.name: region
methodParameterSegments.doc: The region to use for all operations. This parameter is used as a query parameter.

parameters.name: contentType
parameters.doc: Body parameter's content type. Known values are application/json

methodParameterSegments.name: contentType
methodParameterSegments.doc: Body parameter's content type. Known values are application/json

clients.name: MixedParamsClient
clients.doc: Client for testing a mix of client-level and method-level parameters.

methodParameterSegments.name: name
methodParameterSegments.doc: The name of the client. This parameter is used as a header in all operations.

parameters.name: contentType
parameters.doc: Body parameter's content type. Known values are application/json

methodParameterSegments.name: contentType
methodParameterSegments.doc: Body parameter's content type. Known values are application/json

clients.name: PathParamClient
clients.doc: Blob operations with path parameter that should be moved to client level

methodParameterSegments.name: blobName
methodParameterSegments.doc: The name of the blob. This parameter is used as a path parameter in all operations.

clients.name: ParamAliasClient
clients.doc: Operations demonstrating the @paramAlias decorator for renaming parameters in client code

clients.name: QueryParamClient
clients.doc: Blob operations with query parameter that should be moved to client level

methodParameterSegments.name: blobName
methodParameterSegments.doc: The blob name to use for operations
